doc.field: Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera

Includes materials from artists, including, among others, George Maciunas, Heinz Mack, Loren MacIver, Robert Mangold, Sally Mann, John Marin, Alpha and Chris Mason (Hipkiss), Gordon Matta-Clark, James McCracken Jr., Ralph Eugene Meatyard, Julie Mehretu, Jonas Mekas, Prabhavathi Meppayil, Hugh Mesibov, Duane Michals, Santi Moix, Marc de Montebello, Katy Moran, Malcolm Morley, Robert Morris, Carrie Moyer, Matt Mulligan, and Juan Munoz. Also includes a fold-out sheet on a Lisa Mackie exhibition, "Here Then and Now" with a biography of the artist. Also includes a Whitney Museum of American Art poster on the public program, "Christian Marclay: Festival." Includes a Tate Modern guide to the 2015 Agnes Martin exhibition. Includes a DIA:Chelsea information guide on the exhibition, "Rita McBride: Particulates." Includes a David Nolan Gallery guide to an exhibition of Works by Wardell Milan with a biography of the artist. Includes a Jewish Museum, New York pamphlet on the exhibition, "Using Floors, Walls, and Ceilings: Beatriz Milhazes", with a short biography of the artist. Includes sveral Jewish Museum, New York gallery guides and Kids gallery guides to the exhibition, "Isaac Mizrahi: An Unruly History." Includes an excerpt of an interview with the artist Karabo Poppy Molestane as the artist prepared to paint the Art Wall at the UC Berkley Art Museum and Pacific Film Archive. Also includes a NYU Grey Art Gallery brochure on public programs around two exhibitions of work by Charlotte Moorman. Includes a DIA:Chelsea information guide on the exhibition of works by Francois Morellet. Includes a NYU Grey Art Gallery brochure on public programs around the exhibition, "Mark Mothersbaugh: Myopia."
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series I. Single Artist Exhibitions >> M (Set 2) (2 folders)
